goal.description: Task 11193: You are looking for an expensive restaurant and it should be in the south part of town. Make sure you get the address of the venue.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to find an expensive restauant that's in the south section of the city.

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: There are several restaurants in the south part of town that serve expensive food. Do you have a cuisine preference?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No I don't care about the type of cuisine.

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: Chiquito Restaurant Bar is a Mexican restaurant located in the south part of town.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: What is their address?

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: There address is 2G Cambridge Leisure Park Cherry Hinton Road Cherry Hinton, it there anything else I can help you with?

non-categorical.value: 2G Cambridge Leisure Park Cherry Hinton Road Cherry Hinton

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: What is the food type they serve ?

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: They serve Mexican food .

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Nope, that's what I was looking for. Thanks a lot!

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: Thank you very much for using the Cambridge Restaurant System.

goal.description: Task 02790: You want to find a moderately priced restaurant and it should serve cantonese food. If there is no such venue how about chinese type of food. You want to know the phone number of the venue.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: How about chinese type of food?

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: the Golden wok serves chinese food and is in the moderate price range.  Would you like their location?

turns.utterance: Their phone number is 01223 350688.

turns.utterance: What is the area?

turns.utterance: it is located in the north part of town

turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: Goodbye.
